button.style: background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-color: rgb(96, 176, 68); background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgb(138, 221, 109), rgb(96, 176, 68)); background-origin: padding-box; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: bold; height: 46px; left: auto; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 18px; list-style-image: none; list-style-position: outside; resize: none; right: auto; speak: normal; table-layout: auto; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-rendering: auto; text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.246094) 0px -1px 0px; text-overflow: clip; text-transform: none; top: auto; unicode-bidi: normal; vertical-align: middle; visibility: visible; white-space: nowrap; widows: 2; width: 180px; word-break: normal; word-spacing: 0px; word-wrap: normal; marker-start: none; marker-mid: none; marker-end: none; vector-effect: none; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: repeat no-repeat;
